SMC_GroupReadTool (FB)
SMC_GroupReadTool (FB)
Â¶
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_GroupReadTool
This FB is used to read the tool offset.
InOut:
Scope
Name
Type
Comment
Inout
AxisGroup
AXIS_GROUP_REF_SM3
Reference to a group of axes
Input
Execute
BOOL
Executes the FB at the rising edge
ReadMode
SMC_READ_TOOL_MODE
Optional read mode. By default the last set
tool offset of the axis group is read.
Output
ToolOffset
MC_COORD_REF
The read tool offset
Name
STRING
The name of the tool.
Done
BOOL
The tool offset has been read
Error
BOOL
Signals that an error has occurred within the function block
ErrorID
SMC_ERROR
Error identification

rows.Name: AxisGroup
rows.Comment: Reference to a group of axes

rows.Name: Execute
rows.Comment: Executes the FB at the rising edge

rows:
Optional read mode. By default the last set
tool offset of the axis group is read.
The tool offset has been read
Signals that an error has occurred within the function block
